item.title: H.R. 2545 - Data Breach Prevention and Compensation Act of 2019
item.description: Authors: Cummings, Elijah E. and Krishnamoorthi Published: May 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/2545/text Tags: 2010s Bill Data Breach Prevention and Compensation Act of 2019 Federal Trade Commission Office of Cybersecurity US Congress Abstract: To create an Office of Cybersecurity at the Federal Trade Commission for supervision of data security at consumer reporting agencies, to require the promulgation of regulations establishing standards for effective cybersecurity at consumer reporting agencies, to impose penalties on credit reporting agencies for cybersecurity breaches that put sensitive consumer data at risk, and for other purposes.

item.description: Authors: Eshoo, Anna G. and Lofgren Published: December 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/4978/text Tags: 2019 Bill Data Protection Online Privacy Act of 2019 Privacy Rights US Congress Abstract: To provide for individual rights relating to privacy of personal information, to establish privacy and security requirements for covered entities relating to personal information, and to establish an agency to be known as the United States Digital Privacy Agency to enforce such rights and requirements, and for other purposes.
